title: Arwen, Lady Undomiel (3R8)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Elf
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	While you can spot 3 [Elven] allies whose home is site 3, each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -3.
Lore:	“Queenly she looked, and thought and knowledge were in her glance, as of one who has known many things that the years bring.”
Rarity:	R
